liquibase.change.RawSQLChange

liquibase.change.RawSQLChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.RawSQLChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Allows execution of arbitrary SQL.

This change can be used when existing changes are either don't exist, are not flexible enough, or buggy.

Definition at line 13 of file RawSQLChange.java.
